alert.note: Alert for Amite (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 3:25PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF ST. HELENA, NORTHEASTERN EAST FELICIANA PARISHES IN SOUTHEASTERN LOUISIANA AND SOUTHWESTERN AMITE COUNTIES THROUGH 430 PM CDT... At 325 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Darlington, or near Greensburg, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Clinton, Greensburg, Centreville, Felps, Darlington, Easleyville, and Gillsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
